code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[userName,setUserName]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();localStorage.setItem("userName",userName);navigate("/products");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"home__form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"username",children:"Enter your email address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"username",className:"home__input",value:userName,onChange:e=>setUserName(e.target.value),required:true,pattern:"[a-z0-9._%+-]+@[a-z0-9.-]+\\.[a-z]{2,}$",minLength:6,title:"Please enter a valid email address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"home__error",children:userName&&!userName.match(/^[a-z0-9._%+-]+@[a-z0-9.-]+\.[a-z]{2,}$/i)&&"Please enter a valid email address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"home__cta",children:"SIGN IN"})]})});};export default Home;
